abstract: Google has already created a stir by saying it may participate in the government’s upcoming auction of valuable wireless spectrum. But another tech powerhouse has apparently considered joining the bidding as well: Apple.
lead_paragraph: Google has already created a stir by saying it may participate in the government’s upcoming auction of valuable wireless spectrum. But another tech powerhouse has apparently considered joining the bidding as well: Apple.

headline.main: Will Apple Bid for Wireless Spectrum?
